trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_100_000<tab>In barren fields afar, I sense the stirring of dire foes. Those who wander shall make a stand...and you shall serve as their beacon. I, too, mean to confront this rising threat.
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_100_001<tab>Ere we stride into battle, however, let us steep our souls in song─aye, a performance in your honor...
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_000<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Dawn may banish even the darkest night, Yet ever shall primal desires burn.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_001<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Two swords shall vie to lay them low─ A blade born of light and a blade forged of might. Alas, man may entrust his fate unto but one.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_002<tab>Truly, Archon Louisoix had a gift with words. Had circumstances been different, he would have made a magnificent minstrel...
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_100_010<tab>You desire an encore? Very well, it would be my pleasure.
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_100_011<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>, I give you <var 1A 02 /var>Ultima's Bane<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_100_012<tab>From an era long forgotten,♪ A blade of midnight drawn,♪ From a battlefield awakened,♪ A warrior who bears the dawn...♪
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_100_013<tab>From an era long forgotten,♪ A blade of midnight drawn,♪ From a distant land uncharted,♪ A warrior who bears the dawn...♪
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_010<tab>Ever since I first set foot in these lands, I have been haunted by a song.
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_011<tab>It foretold the coming of the Seventh Umbral Era, and of those who would deliver us from doom...
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_020<tab>Of course, I need not speak to you and yours of the prophetess Mezaya Thousand Eyes's words.
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_021<tab>For in the fires of Carteneau, you witnessed the truth of the <var 1A 02 /var>Divine Chronicles<var 1A 01 /var>...
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_022<tab>And when you emerged from the Praetorium triumphant, you proved yourself a Warrior of Light to the world once more.
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_030<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Ne'er till land consumes sun can sea bear moons, Heavens spew crimson flame, hells seep black dooms.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_031<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Stray seeds quicken in ash's grey embrace, Valiant blades forged under the Twelve's good grace.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_032<tab>The words of the prophetess Mezaya Thousand Eyes as writ in her <var 1A 02 /var>Divine Chronicles<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_033<tab>The “crimson flames” of Dalamud heralded the end of an era...
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_034<tab>And the “valiant blades” that were the Warriors of Light brought us hope in our darkest hour.
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_035<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Seven waning moons see seven suns rise, Divine order roils, fallen corpses writhe.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_036<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Souls from aether far, strangers from strange lands, Yester with thine eyes, morrow by thine hands.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_037<tab>We knew not whom the verses spoke of─not I, nor the Archons, nor any other soul in the realm.
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_038<tab>The Warriors of Light were lost to us. If not them, who could it be?
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_039<tab>And then came the rumors of one not unlike them─a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who walked in the light of the Crystal.

TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_040<tab>From the moment I saw you, I felt it must be true. Having learned of your deeds in their entirety, I now <var 1A 02 /var>know<var 1A 01 /var> it to be true.
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_041<tab>You are as they were, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─a Warrior of Light, and an inspiration to us all.
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_050<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Lances of light herald the dawn, Beckoning shadows deeper still.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_051<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Splendor dances with shades Unsheathed, a rime-kissed blade Spills crimson o'er fields of white.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_052<tab>Archon Louisoix warned us that shadows will accompany the coming of dawn. In answer to ascendant Light, Darkness will gather in opposition...or so I interpret his words.

TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_053<tab>What “a rime-kissed blade” signifies, I cannot yet fathom. But I have heard that roses of blood are blooming in the white fields of Coerthas, in ever greater profusion.
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_054<tab>The Twelve keep and defend you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. What tales you'll have to tell when next we meet!

TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_060<tab>Into the flesh of Darkness go bringers of Light,♪ for the flame that flickers in Bahamut's tomb.♪ In that cloying black stirs a raven white,♪ clawing blood from a barren womb.♪
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_061<tab>What was slain in silver proud did in golden malice rise.♪ Metals of infamy and ruin, that every hero must despise.♪
TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_062<tab>Do these verses ring a bell, perchance? I wrote this song to immortalize your journey into Dalamud's Shadow.

TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_063<tab>One of my most requested songs, especially in those halls and taverns frequented by adventurers. Oftentimes, I can save my voice in the later verses, for the whole place is on its feet by then, belting out the words by heart...

TEXT_CMNDEFMINSTREL01_00138_WANDERINGMINSTREL_000_064<tab>A touch hyperbolic? Why, 'tis the broad strokes that make a popular ballad! Else we would be singing of mending socks and sitting on cushions, would we not? We shall talk again soon─tell me more tales of derring-do, won't you?
